name: Primal Force Arena
storyline:
Primal Force Arena primarily features the journey of our protagonist, Raze Horden, as he navigates the challenges of the Primal Force Arena, the most renowned tournament held by the Primal Council to determine the next Primal King, the ruler of Primalion and the guardian of the Primal Force's crucial stability.

As the former commander of the Primal King's elite forces, Raze has vowed to fulfill his ultimate duty by uncovering the essence of the previous Primal Force Arena's unforeseen drama, which disastrously disrupted the balance of matters and led to the tragic disappearance of the Primal King.
summary: Primal Force Arena is a sci-fi, online competitive multiplayer game that lets players engage in fast-paced tactical turn-based battles, infused with action-packed elements and RPG touches. Embody your favorite Primal Masters, hone your tactics, enhance your equipment, and ascend to global dominance through thrilling game modes!

videos.name: Teaser
